author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Baker Hughes Average U.S. Rig Count For March 2018 Up By 200 YOY
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Baker Hughes A GE Co:
* BAKER HUGHES, A GE COMPANY ANNOUNCES MARCH 2018 RIG COUNTS
* BAKER HUGHES INTERNATIONAL RIG COUNT FOR MARCH 2018 WAS 972, DOWN 7 FROM 979 COUNTED IN FEBRUARY 2018
* AVERAGE U.S. RIG COUNT FOR MARCH 2018 WAS 989, UP 200 FROM 789 COUNTED IN MARCH 2017
* INTERNATIONAL OFFSHORE RIG COUNT FOR MARCH 2018 WAS 185, DOWN 9 FROM 194 COUNTED IN FEBRUARY 2018
* WORLDWIDE RIG COUNT FOR MARCH 2018 WAS 2,179, UP 194 FROM 1,985 COUNTED IN MARCH 2017
* AVERAGE CANADIAN RIG COUNT FOR MARCH 2018 WAS 218, DOWN 105 FROM 323 COUNTED IN FEBRUARY 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
